channel.title: A Few Things
channel.description:
Alright, these things are really getting on my nerves -The Variable For Cure Poison? I.E. I have "Poisoned = false;", It compiles fine, but I'm still poisoned? Is this the correct variable? HELP PLEASE -Changing The Maximum Ammount Of Experience? I.E. People stop gaining experience at around 14,500,000, it's not exactly that number, so I can't just find it and edit it, is there a way to make it so they NEVER stop gaining experience? or is there a way to make it so they don't stop gaining experience until around 999m xp? -.cfg files not working? I.E. objects.cfg npcdrops.cfg and drops.cfg do nothing when i edit them, even when they compile perfectly, help? :(
Thanks in advance to all of you who can help[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 02:19:29 PM[/size][hr]No Help?...Brilliant...

item.title: A Few Things
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Go here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,104200.0.html for help with the npcdrops. I can’t help you with anything else, sorry :\

item.title: A Few Things
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Alright, these things are really getting on my nerves
-The Variable For Cure Poison?
I.E. I have “Poisoned = false;”, It compiles fine, but I’m still poisoned? Is this the correct variable? HELP PLEASE
-Changing The Maximum Ammount Of Experience?
I.E. People stop gaining experience at around 14,500,000, it’s not exactly that number, so I can’t just find it and edit it, is there a way to make it so they NEVER stop gaining experience? or is there a way to make it so they don’t stop gaining experience until around 999m xp?
-.cfg files not working?
I.E. objects.cfg npcdrops.cfg and drops.cfg do nothing when i edit them, even when they compile perfectly, help?

Thanks in advance to all of you who can help[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 02:19:29 PM[/size][hr]No Help?..Brilliant…

Read full topic
